text: is a Japanese kickboxer and Muay Thai fighter. ==Martial arts career== Ishii fought Jin Mandokoro during KNOCK OUT's 2018 SUMMER FES event. Ishii won the fight by a unanimous decision. He fought Daishin Sakai at Rizin 10, and won the fight by unanimous decision. He fought Taiga Nakayama during the KNOCK OUT 2018 Crossover event. He beat Nakayama by a third round TKO. In December of 2018, Ishii fought Kazuki Osaki for the inaugural KNOCK OUT Flyweight title. He beat Osaki by majority decision. Aside from winning the title, he was awarded ¥3 000 000 in prize money. Issei fought Petchthailand Moopingaroijung for the vacant IBF Muay Thai World Flyweight Title. He defeated Moopingaroijung by a third round spinning back kick KO. He was scheduled to fight for the WBC Muaythai Super Flyweight title against Petchthailand Moopingaroijung. He lost the fight by decision. It was his first loss in nearly two years. After failing to win the WBC Muaythai Super Flyweight title, Issei fought Nuapetch KelaSport. He beat Nuapetch by third round TKO. Ishii fought Hiroyuki for the Battle of Muay Thai Super Flyweight title. Ishii won the fight by unanimous decision. == Championships and accomplishments== Amateur * 2010 WINDY Super Fight -30kg Champion * 2010 M-1 -35KG Champion * 2010 King of Strikers -35kg Champion * 2011 M-1 Junior -35kg Championhttps://gbring.com/sokuho/result/result2011_06/0626_m-1.htm * 2011 King of Strikers -40kg Champion * 2012 Windy Kick Jr 40kg Champion * * 2013 GLADIATOR Kick Jr 45kg * * 2013 Trang Province 45kg Champion Professional * 2014 Punpanmuang Mini Flyweight Champion * * 2017 True4u Flyweight Champion * * 2018 KNOCK OUT Flyweight Champion * * 2019 IBF Muay Thai World Flyweight Champion * * 2019 WPMF World Flyweight Champion * 2020 Battle of Muay Thai Super Flyweight Champion ==Fight record== {| class="toccolours" width=100% style="clear:both;
